question: where was the hindenburg scheduled to fly and how many passengers were on it
api_result: The Hindenburg, a German passenger airship, was scheduled to fly from Frankfurt, Germany, to Lakehurst, New Jersey, USA. On its final flight on May 6, 1937, the Hindenburg was carrying 36 passengers and 61 crew members, totaling 97 people on board when it caught fire and was destroyed upon attempting to dock at the Lakehurst Naval Air Station.
